definitions.definition: A mixture consisting of beaten egg whites and sugar which is added to the tops of pies then browned.
examples: The key to a good baked Alaska is the meringue topping.

definitions.definition: A shell made of this mixture which serves as the receptacle for fruit, ice cream or sherbet.
examples: Shirley likes to have strawberry with her meringue .

main_definition: A mixture consisting of beaten egg whites and sugar which is added to the tops of pies then browned.
secondary_definitions: A shell made of this mixture which serves as the receptacle for fruit, ice cream or sherbet.
